| Property               | Attribute | Description        | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------------- | --------- | ------------------ | --------- | ----------- |

| `tilte`                | `tilte`   | title              | `string`  | `''`        |
| `visible` _(required)_ | `visible` |                    | `boolean` | `undefined` |
